MWC.GUI.Chart.Painters

Class SpatialRasterPainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.Plottables
      • MWC.GUI.BaseLayer
        • MWC.GUI.Chart.Painters.SpatialRasterPainter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Plottable>, java.util.EventListener, CanEnumerate, Editable, BathyProvider, HasEditables, Layer, Layer.BackgroundLayer, Plottable, PlottablesType, Renamable, SupportsPropertyListeners
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ETOPO_2_Minute

    public abstract class SpatialRasterPainter
extends BaseLayer
implements Layer.BackgroundLayer, BathyProvider
    interface which indicates that this class is capable of providing an integer value at the indicated grid location .
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
